item.title: Universal to reopen Stardust Racers roller coaster ride 2 weeks after man’s death
item.description: Universal Orlando Resort plans to reopen its Stardust Racers ride at Epic Universe on Saturday.

item.title: Police arrest suspect for Bradenton homicide
item.description: Police arrest suspect for Bradenton homicide

item.title: Closures across I-275 today
item.description: Today from 5 a.m. to 10 p.m., travelers on I-275 should expect delays.

item.title: Florida waterfront trail to honor wrestling legend Hulk Hogan
item.description: A stretch of a waterfront trail in the Florida Gulf Coast community of Clearwater is being renamed to honor the mustachioed, headscarf-wearing wrestling giant Hulk Hogan, who called the city home and died earlier this year.

item.title: Wonderball 2025 takes center stage
item.description: Wonderball fundraiser opens its doors at 7 p.m. Oct. 4 for its high-energy, one-night-only event and fundraiser.

item.title: Countdown to trash pickup changes in Manatee county begins
item.description: Beginning Oct. 6, a new solid waste collection schedule will take effect.

item.title: Feds approve Florida for a $608 million ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ reimbursement
item.description: Federal officials have confirmed Florida's approval for a $608 million reimbursement for building and running an immigration detention center in the Everglades

item.title: Breezy days continue with evening rain
item.description: The best odds for seeing precipitation will come into our forecast Sunday into Monday.

item.title: Golf with Olympians tees off
item.description: This event benefiting the MAG Foundation USA, was held at University Park Country Club.

item.title: Police arrest suspect for Bradenton homicide
item.description: 69 year old Francisco Ramos-Moradel has been arrested for stabbing a woman in Bradenton on September 28th.
